body.name: NUK Simply Natural Baby Bottle with SafeTemp, 5 oz, 1 Pack
body.stockDetail: Only 18 left in stock (more on the way).
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 19 hrs 28 mins
features: Multiple nipple holes provide a natural feed, just like mom’s breast
Features NUK’s SafeTemp indicator, which changes color when milk is too hot
Nipple comes with 3, 6, or 9 holes, depending on flow rate
5-oz. bottle comes with slow flow nipple that has 3 holes, 9-oz. comes with medium flow nipple that has 6 holes
Advanced 1-piece Anti-Colic Air Vent helps reduce colic, gas, and spit up
body.description: Now your baby can transition from breast to bottle in a natural way with the NUK® Simply Natural™ Bottles. Designed to mimic the fit, flow, and movement of mom as closely as possible, this is the only bottle with up to 9 nipple holes, just like mom. This provides a natural feeding experience to ensure the mom-baby bond remains strong. NUK® Simply Natural™ bottles feature a super-soft nipple that mimics the shape of mom's breast while breastfeeding. The scoop nipple cavity allows space for baby's tongue and jaw to move naturally, just like they do when breastfeeding. Now NUK® Simply Natural™ bottles feature SafeTemp technology, which lets you know when milk is too hot. The blue thermometer indicator fades when milk is too hot and reappears when milk has cooled and is safe to drink.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve tried the other name brands before but I always end up going back to Nuk. Absolutely love the design of the nipples and bottles are sturdy. I don’t dishwash my bottles I wash them and then sterilize after. I’m not sure if that makes a difference with all the other reviews saying it cracks easy, either way I like the bottles and is amazing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for That Last Drop
reviews.reviewText: Minimal parts to clean. Dishwasher safe. And with the wide neck style baby can drink even that last drop. They’re great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite bottles!
reviews.reviewText: I have an 8 month old son and I purchased a few of these bottles to give them a try. Honestly, what a difference from standard bottles. They feel really well made and the small air vent in the nipple allows liquid to flow much faster speeding up feeding time by roughly about half. It seems my son likes them better too since it’s easier for him to drink from. It helps in the middle of the night when your child is crying for a bottle and your exhausted and just want to go back to sleep. I have been very very happy with the few Nuk products I have tried and these bottles are no exception!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best bottles out there
reviews.reviewText: I think these baby bottles are the best. My daughter loves this brand and she even likes their pacifiers too!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Bought for my little one.My little one likes Nuk bottles best. The 4 pack of 10 oz bottles was just what I needed. I have used them a lot. Sturdy, plastic bottles. Easy to clean by hand or in dish washer. Has held up well with many washes.Hard to take lid off and put back on with one hand. Little one is in grabbing stage, so it’s be helpful to make the lid easier to take on and not fed with one hand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best bottles
reviews.reviewText: Easy to clean, dish washer safe. Work great in a bottle warmer, very durable. Best bottles and nipples around !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these bottles
reviews.reviewText: Ordered another set for my second child. I loved these with my first. They are easy to clean, assemble and disassemble and my son was able to hold them on his own around 6 months. I also like the larger capacity as I have had two hungry babies who eat more than 5oz in one feed. Definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for babies around 3+ Months
reviews.reviewText: I love these bottles. My son is picky on his bottles. He has went back and forth between different brands of bottles (tippee tommee and Advent). But he always prefers this bottle to both of them. The nipple rarely gets clogged. The heat strip has always been accurate no matter how many times I wash it!

This is the only bottle my baby accepted. I breastfed him, but when he started daycare they gave him formula so he had to drink from a bottle. I tried multiple bottles but this is the only one he liked.
Just what I was looking for.

I owned another nuk bottle and it wasn't like the new one I bought. The blue ink literally leaked into the milk. Completely unsafe and unsanitary. The bottle itself is very flimsy and cheap compared to the last one I owned.
Bebe adore la forme de tétine. Augmentation des boires
She liked it once. Now she doesn’t. It’s not breast like enough.
